[[New Orleans Saints]] |ProBowls= |HOF= }} '''John Charles Fuller''' (born March 3, 1946 in [[Beaumont, Texas]]) is a former professional [[American football]] player. He played eight seasons as a [[Safety (football position)|safety]] in the [[National Football League]] for the [[San Francisco 49ers]], [[New Orleans Saints]] and [[Chicago Bears]]. {{Persondata | NAME =Fuller, Johnny | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = American football player | DATE OF BIRTH =March 3, 1946 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Beaumont, Texas]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Fuller, Johnny}} [[Category:1946 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:American football safeties]] [[Category:San Francisco 49ers players]] [[Category:New Orleans Saints players]] [[Category:Lamar University alumni]] [[Category:Lamar Cardinals football players]] {{defensiveback-1940s-stub}}
